description.value:
Experimental approach for an AU PS actor. This actor is based on the Producer (IPS) actor, and describes the additional requirements and documentation applied for the Australian context. This experimental actor will be used in place of IPS actor to define obligations within the Experimental AU PS profiles. This is the expected approach for the HL7 AU Patient Summary FHIR IG.
An AU PS Producer is a system which creates or assembles an AU PS Bundle through automated generation or human curation of the patient summary content.

documentation.value:
An AU Patient Summary Consumer **SHALL** comply with the requirements of the [IPS Producer](https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-ips/ActorDefinition-Producer.html), and:
- **SHALL** implement AU PS Bundle, AU PS Composition and AU PS Patient profiles
- **SHALL** for each additional resource type implemented, implement an appropriate profile referenced in the AU PS Bundle;
- **SHALL** implement obligations defined for this actor in the implemented profiles. Where an IPS profile is referenced in the AU PS Bundle the obligations of the Consumer (IPS) actor SHALL apply
- **SHALL** implement the requirements on Suppressed Data when an element is NOT allowed to be shared
- **SHALL** implement the requirements on Missing Data when an element value is NOT known
